Justice of the Peace -- 2nd Justice Court
Justice of the Peace -- 7th Justice Court
PW Sports Wagering -- Authorize Sports Wagering Activities - Act 215, 2020
Race.SummaryText: PROPOSITION TO AUTHORIZE SPORTS WAGERING ACTIVITIES.
Race.FullText: Shall sports wagering activities and operations be permitted in the parish of Jefferson?

Race.SpecificTitle: Inspector General Special Services Funding Dist. -- 1/2 Mill Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Inspector General Special Services Funding District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Parish Inspector General Special Services Funding District of the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a special tax of not to exceed one-half (1/2) mill on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, to be annually levied, with collections from the levy of the tax estimated to be $1,495,288 for one entire year, and dedicated to the following public purposes: to be deposited in and credited to the Inspector General & Ethics Fund and used to provide, maintain, administer and operate an office of inspector general and an ethics and compliance commission in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Grand Isle -- 5.49 Mills Continuation - M&TC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Grand Isle Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Grand Isle, State of Louisiana, continue to levy and collect a special tax of five and forty-nine hundredths (5.49) mills on all property subject to taxation in said Town (an estimated $340,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating the Water and Gas Utility System in the Town and works of public improvement, said millage to represent a forty-three hundredths of a mill (.43) increase over the 5.06 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2021 pursuant to an election held on March 24, 2012?
